item.title: Karen Read Reacts to Elizabeth Banks Prime Video Series: “Not Authorized By Me in Any Way”
item.description: Read participated in her first interview since she was acquitted of the murder of her boyfriend John O’Keefe in June.

item.title: Elizabeth Banks to Play Karen Read in Amazon Limited Series About Murder Trial
item.description: Elizabeth Banks will play Karen Read in a limited series about the controversial trial in development at Prime Video and Warner Bros. Television, Variety has confirmed. The series is based on the podc
